description: ff. 115. 267 x 170; 195 x 120 mm. 27 lin. 16th cen. After a long introduction dealing with various branches of knowledge (fol. 2a-42b), the work begins with bāb al-ṭahārah (fol. 42b) and concludes with bāb al-janāʼiz; on fol. 33a, lin. 6 the author mentions his teacher Kamāl al-Dīn ibn Abī Sharīf (d. 906/1500). Incip.: ... حمدا لك اللهم على ما خصصتنى مع منح العوارف
author: ḥijāzī, Muḥammad ibn al-ʻIzz, 16th cent
creator: ḥijāzī, Muḥammad ibn al-ʻIzz, 16th cent
subject: Islamic law—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
